Pre-Game Insights: Australia are expected to hand a T20I cap to Tim David, while Pant has something to prove for India
India have had some time to figure out what has worked for them and, more importantly, what hasn't
It'll be interesting to see how Tim David fits into the international set-up
Rishabh Pant is yet to find his mojo in T20Is
Others: The match will take place in Mohali, India on September 20, 2022
The series is part of Australia's tour of India
